dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: plotObservation
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores plot information that may vary between sampling events.
entity.entityDescription: Recognizing that a plot may be resampled and that some of the environmental conditions may change between resampling events the database design has changed to accomodate this. Now all attributes that are percieved to potentially change on the order of a decade are stored in the plotObservation table whereas those attributes deemed to be regular in time/space are stored in the plot table.

attribute.attDefinition: This is an internal database identifier assigned to each unique observation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plot table.
attribute.attDefinition: This represents the link between an observation plot location.

attribute.attNotes: Recursive foreign key which points to the previous observation in this area
attribute.attDefinition: This is the plot observtion that was previously made at this plot location. If observations at a plot are made every year then this key points to the observation number that corresponds to the observation made the year before.
This is the code that the author uses to identify this observation.

attribute.attNotes: Attribute added at the September meeting at NCEAS.
attribute.attDefinition: If the observation takes more than a single day then this is the first day in which observations were made.

attribute.attNotes: Attribute added at the September meeting at NCEAS.
attribute.attDefinition: If the observation takes more than a single day then this is the last day in which observations were made.

attribute.attNotes: Added at the September meeting at NCEAS.
attribute.attDefinition: Estimated Accuracy of the observation date.

attribute.attNotes: Use pick list; 1) Very thorough 2) Average effort 3) Hurried description; some less common species may have been missed.
attribute.attDefinition: This is the effort spent making the observations as estimated by the data collector.
